Justify Items

# Justify Items

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                         | Support     |
| ----------------------------- | ----------- |
| ```
justify-items-start
```   | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
justify-items-end
```     | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
justify-items-center
```  | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
justify-items-stretch
``` | 🌐 Web only |
